WorkItem.Description:
The current pvp top level filter: 
 
"PVP|Goodman|Arena Points|Honor Points|Sergeant Thunderhorn|Blazzek the Biter|Kezzik the Striker|Grex Brainboiler|Nargle Lashcord|Big Zokk Torquewrench|Xazi Smolderpipe|Lieutenant Tristia|Doris Volanthius|Arena Rating|Leeni|Faldren Tillsdale|Jamus'Vaz| 0  Points "
 
Does not capture items whose cost is "0  Points".  Note the extra space at the end of the rule.  If the space is removed, the rule appears to work as intended.
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] PVP Filter does not capture "0  Points" items

Comments.Message:
This was corrected with a "for 0  Points" there is an extra space between 0 and P.
Also Faldren Tillsdale was removed from this filter as he is not a PVP exclusive vendor.
